data.title: Fortuny
data.meta_description: Fortuny makes the finest printed fabrics in the world, handmade in Venice since 1907. Continuing our legacy of unique innovation and timeless artistry.
data.text:
Interior designer Chahan Minassian's mastery seamlessly blends contemporary elements with Fortuny's unrivalled fabrics, handcrafted by artisans at the original factory established by Spanish artist and inventor Mariano Fortuny y Madrazo in 1921. This fusion promises a transformative perspective on the art of living, creating an immersive experience where visitors can acquire furnishings and objects, bringing a piece of Venetian living home.

The space is available by appointment, from Mondays to Saturdays, from 10:00 to 18:00.
